messages.content: How do I install the comfyui-llm-assistant node?
To install the comfyui-llm-assistant node, use the ComfyUI-Manager or add the code to the custom_nodes directory.
What command should I run to install the dependencies for the comfyui-llm-assistant node?
Run the command 'pip install -r requirements.txt' to install the dependencies for the comfyui-llm-assistant node.
Where do I edit the configuration of the comfyui-llm-assistant node?
Edit the configuration of the comfyui-llm-assistant node by modifying the 'config.yaml' file and providing your API key and other necessary information.
